name: Dash Blocks: Snake Number
description:
Dash Blocks: Snake Number!!!
Control the snake flexible to slide and avoid!
Break as many bricks as possible to get highest scores
Swipe your finger to move left or right to avoid hitting balls, if the snake balls is shorter than strength of block, you will die. try you best to eat more ball blocks to get higher snake. It’s easy-to-play, but difficult to get high score.
How To Play
- Eat the balls on the road to increase snake length.
- A block you destroy will increase score by one.
- Touch your finger on screen and swipe to left or right to move slither snake.
- Avoid high strength block then your length otherwise slither snake will die in Snake dash block.
